meta.title: Max App - Your Trusted Development Partner
meta.description: We are a professional software development company specializing in web and mobile applications. Let's build something amazing together!

hero.title: Your Trusted
hero.subtitle: Development Partner
hero.description: We are a professional software development company specializing in web and mobile applications. Let's build something amazing together!

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the Future of Digital Solutions
about.description: We are a team of passionate developers and designers who love to create amazing digital experiences. Our goal is to help businesses grow through technology.

operations.title: Global Operations
operations.description: With a presence in multiple countries, we deliver solutions worldwide while maintaining our Swiss quality standards.

company.intro: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between business needs and technological solutions, we've grown into a trusted partner for companies worldwide.
company.teams: Our teams consist of experienced developers, designers, and project managers who bring diverse perspectives and expertise to every project.
company.unique: What sets us apart is our commitment to excellence, transparent communication, and our ability to deliver solutions that drive real business value.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: We work with clients worldwide, delivering solutions that transcend geographical boundaries.

expert.title: Expert Teams
expert.description: Our specialists bring years of experience and deep expertise in the latest technologies.

quality.title: Swiss Quality
quality.description: We maintain the highest standards of quality and precision in every project we deliver.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Digital Solutions
services.description: We offer a wide range of services to help you achieve your goals.

webApps.title: Web Applications
webApps.description: Custom web applications built with modern technologies to solve your business needs.

websites.title: Business Websites
websites.description: Professional websites that showcase your brand and drive customer engagement.

pwa.title: Progressive Web Apps
pwa.description: Modern web apps that provide a native app-like experience across all devices.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: We create beautiful, responsive websites that work seamlessly across all devices.

mobileDev.title: Mobile Development
mobileDev.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.

cloudSolutions.title: Cloud Solutions
cloudSolutions.description: Scalable cloud infrastructure and solutions to power your applications.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Expert advice to help you make the right technical decisions for your business.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: Excellence in Every Project
whyUs.description: We combine technical expertise with a deep understanding of business needs.

swissStandards.name: Swiss Quality Standards
swissStandards.description: We adhere to the highest Swiss quality standards in every project we deliver, ensuring exceptional results.

costEffective.name: Cost-Effective Solutions
costEffective.description: We deliver high-quality solutions while maintaining cost efficiency through smart resource allocation.

customSolutions.name: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: We create tailored solutions that perfectly match your unique business requirements and goals.

fastDelivery.name: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: Our agile approach ensures quick delivery without compromising on quality.

provenSuccess.name: Proven Success
provenSuccess.description: Our track record speaks for itself with successful projects across various industries.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Showcasing Our Best Work
projects.description: Take a look at some of our recent projects that demonstrate our expertise and commitment to delivering exceptional solutions.

techStack.title: Our Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: Modern Technologies for Modern Solutions
techStack.description: We use cutting-edge technologies and frameworks to build scalable, maintainable, and high-performance applications.

Frontend Development.title: Frontend Development
Frontend Development.description: Modern, responsive, and interactive user interfaces built with cutting-edge web technologies.

Backend Development.title: Backend Development
Backend Development.description: Robust and scalable server-side solutions that power our applications.

Database Systems.title: Database Systems
Database Systems.description: Efficient and reliable data storage and management systems.

Cloud & DevOps.title: Cloud & DevOps
Cloud & DevOps.description: Seamless deployment and scaling with modern cloud infrastructure.

Design & Collaboration.title: Design & Collaboration
Design & Collaboration.description: Tools and platforms that enable beautiful design and efficient teamwork.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear about it. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

error.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
Please enter a valid phone number

submit.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Get in touch with us through any of these channels.

offices.title: Our Global Offices
offices.description: We have a presence in multiple locations to serve you better.

modal.title: Contact Submission
modal.name: Name
modal.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this submission? This action cannot be undone.

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

cookieBanner.mainText: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept all," you consent to our use of cookies. See our {policyLink} for more information about how we use cookies and how to manage your preferences.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us improve our website by collecting anonymous usage information.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Remember your settings and preferences for a better experience.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
introduction.paragraph2: Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it.

infoWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
items: Technical information (IP address, browser type, device information)
Usage data (how you interact with our services)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To provide and maintain our services
To communicate with you about our services
To improve our services and user experience
To detect and prevent fraud or abuse

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data on the following legal grounds:
items: Performance of a contract when providing our services
Our legitimate interests in operating our business

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our services, conducting our business, or serving you, subject to strict confidentiality agreements.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your data. You can also object to processing and request data portability.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it, including for legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in such cases.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@maxapp.com.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences, analyzing how you use our site, and enabling certain features.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our website and services.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.content: These cookies enable the website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region you are in.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.content: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie rights by setting your preferences in the Cookie Consent Manager. Here's what you can do:
items: Choose which categories of cookies to accept
Change your cookie preferences at any time
Withdraw your consent at any time

howToControl.title: How to Control Cookies
howToControl.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. However, if you limit the ability of websites to set cookies, you may worsen your overall user experience. To manage your cookie preferences on our website, click the button below.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us through our contact form or email us at privacy@maxapp.com.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our cookie practices.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: We provide software development and consulting services, including but not limited to:
services.note: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: Our intellectual property includes, but is not limited to:
intellectualProperty.note: All rights, title, and interest in and to our services are and will remain the exclusive property of Max App and its licensors.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.content: When creating an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the security of your account
All activities that occur under your account
Promptly notifying us of any unauthorized use
Ensuring your account information is up to date

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content: You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not violate any laws in your jurisdiction while using our services.
